authors: Jessica Aquilina For Daily Mail Australia
description: Kym Johnson took plunging necklines to new depths at the G'Day USA Gala Dinner in LA on Thursday.
title: Kym Johnson wears plunging gown to G'Day USA Gala with Robert Herjavec
title_page: Kym Johnson wears plunging gown to G'Day USA Gala with Robert Herjavec | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's a talented dancer with an evolving fitness empire.
But on Thursday night at the G'Day USA Gala Dinner in Los Angeles, Kym Johnson added ravishing fashionista to her long list of credentials.
The 39-year-old Dancing With The Stars personality exuded sex appeal as she took to the red carpet with billionaire beau Robert Herjavec, wearing a plunging black gown that showed off her ample cleavage.
Scroll down for video
Plunging depths! Kym Johnson takes plunging necklines to new depths as she adds some va-va-voom to the G'Day USA gala crimson carpet in a ravishing number
The designer dress also incorporated a daring thigh-high split which revealed the Sydney native's toned pins as she placed both hands on her hips as she posed solo for the cameras.
Kym kept accessories to a minimum to keep the floor-length gown the main focus and opted for a simple gold bracelet, watch and stud earrings.
Boosting her petite frame, the professional ballroom dancer added black platform peep-toe heels under her dress.
The blonde beauty styled her short locks into tidy bob, while applying a thick layer of pink lipstick onto her naturally plump lips.
Revealing gown! The designer dress also incorporated a daring thigh-high split which revealed the Sydney native's toned pins as she placed both hands on her hips
The dance champion also made sure to accentuate her big blue eyes with thick lashings of mascara and a light dusting of pink powder on her cheeks.
The LA-based star also showed off her her new squeeze, Robert Herjavec, at the exclusive event.
The businessman was equally dressed to impress and was seen lovingly wrapping his arm around his girlfriend.
The inventor and author wore a stylish white blazer over his black button-up shirt, paired with matching trousers.
Looking dapper in his red carpet uniform, the 53-year-old completed his look with dress shoes and a polka-dot handkerchief in his blazer pocket.
New love! The LA-based star made sure to show off her her billionaire beau, Robert Herjavec, on the red carpet of the exclusive event
The pro dancer and her beau have been together for a little over nine months, after falling for each other during Season 20 of US Dancing With The Stars.
'We were friends first, and we got to know each other on a friendship level; I think that's really important,' Kym told People magazine recently.
From there, their relationship grew into a romantic one.
'...it's really great. We're both each other's number one fans, and have respect for each other,' she pointed out.
